```{r setup, include=FALSE}
# Get the Data
colony <- read_csv("/Users/lucamainini/Library/CloudStorage/OneDrive-PolitecnicodiMilano/Nonparametric statistics/BEES/colony.csv")
stressor <- read_csv("/Users/lucamainini/Library/CloudStorage/OneDrive-PolitecnicodiMilano/Nonparametric statistics/BEES/stressor.csv")

```


```{r}
library(explore)
library(dplyr) 
explore(data)
```

```{r}
new_stress <- stressor %>% tidyr::pivot_wider(
  names_from = stressor, 
  values_from = stress_pct,
  values_fill = 0
)
```

```{r}
# Merge data frames together
data <- inner_join(colony, new_stress, by = c("year","months","state"))
```


```{r}
fm <- lm(data=data, colony_lost_pct~`Varroa mites`+`Other pests/parasites`+Disesases+Pesticides + Other + Unknown)
summary(fm)
plot(fm)
```
